code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{createItem}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddItemForm=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[price,setPrice]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await createItem({name,description,price});alert('Item added successfully!');setName('');setDescription('');setPrice('');}catch(error){console.error('Error adding item:',error);alert('Failed to add item');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Description:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Price:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",step:"0.01",value:price,onChange:e=>setPrice(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Item"})]});};export default AddItemForm;
